title: iPad Air 5 tidbits: Studio Display support, no 5G mmWave, faster USB-C port
content:
The iPad Air 5 is finally here. With the powerful M1 chip, as first reported by 9to5Mac, this new iPad also comes with 5G support, new colors, and more. Here’s everything Apple didn’t tell you about this product during the keynote.

more…

The post iPad Air 5 tidbits: Studio Display support, no 5G mmWave, faster USB-C port appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The iPad Air 5 is finally here. Here's everything Apple didn't tell you about this product during the "Peek Performance" keynote.
